vote.title: To amend A0173-2024 Appointment of Elon Simms, Chief of Staff, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Confluence Community Authority Board of Trustees, to include the phrase “in his official capacity”, replacing Ken Paul, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2027 (profile attached). (Amended by Ord. A0222-2024 passed on 12/16/2024). LG
vote.description:
Title
 
To amend A0173-2024 Appointment of Elon Simms, Chief of Staff, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Confluence Community Authority Board of Trustees, to include the phrase “in his official capacity”, replacing Ken Paul, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2027 (profile attached).
